Posts.Content: Sep 16, 2014 08:33AM gciriani wrote: I have found a formulation that abates HFS symptoms more than any of the palliatives described; my wife's oncologist is very interested in it. It is not commercially available in the US (it is undergoing clinical trials in the Czech Republik), so I'm preparing it myself after buying the ingredients from chemical labs. If anybody were interested in trying it, drop me a personal message.
